content.headline: Responsible organizations
content.intro: Which organization is responsible for your project? Add or remove organizations here.

add.headline: Add organization
add.intro: Add an existing organization to your event here.
add.label: Name of the organization

own.headline: Add your own organizations
own.intro: Here your own organizations are suggested for you to add as responsible organizations with one click.
own.label: Add

current.headline: Current organizations
current.intro: Here you can see all the currently responsible organizations at a glance.
